posts.post_title: FS  N173  Old Judge  3 SGC Commons
posts.post_content: Selling  1888 Old Judge  N173  Thomas Brown $650==Sowders $575==Hatfield $900--check scans--Sowders has the writing on back--Brown small paper loss on back--Hatfield back is clean---shipping is $10--mailed Priority Mail--Paypal or Check,  thanks,  Don
